notes.text:
python-PyYAML was updated to fix one security issue which could have allowed an attacker to cause a denial of service by supplying specially crafted strings

The following issue was fixed:
- #921588: python-PyYAML: assert failure when processing wrapped strings (equivalent to CVE-2014-9130 in LibYAML)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: scanner.c in LibYAML 0.1.5 and 0.1.6, as used in the YAML-LibYAML (aka YAML-XS) module for Perl, allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and crash) via vectors involving line-wrapping.
notes.title: CVE description
